review: The Fire TV stick is basically worthless as it has to be very close to a wireless router to update and stream movies. I could only get it to work if within 15- 20 ft (with and without the extender) of the router. Not functional in a house. I had purchased the stick to add the Fire TV in the master bedroom. I would not recommend this item if you want something that works well.
